TextView.android:text: Of late one of the major social issues is women's safety which is at stake. They are prone to heinous attacks when outside home. And so are children and senior citizens. A smartphone in your pocket can come to your rescue when trapped in danger just by a click.\nThis app features sending messages to emergency contacts in a click, once or repeatedly, where the distress message includes the information about user and his/her last recorded GPS location. The victim can also sound an alert alarm if needed.
